title: LF D5+ TOP and SUP for R5
body:
Looking for a Diamond 5+ Top main and a Diamond 5+ Support main for a new ranked 5s team.
Our goal will be to reach challenger and then create an organisation.
Must be Committed enough to stay around for 6 months - 1 year.
Practice will be 1-2 games every day, with weekends 3-5 games with video replays and analysis.
Players will be required to adjust to mastering new champions and learning the new strongest meta picks.
Players will also be required to do self-improvement activities in their own time such as watching replays of their games or watching youtube videos league of legends related.

replies.body: Hey, I'm plat 3 but peaked plat 1. I've already added you. I think?
